## Yield Histogram for all locations
```{r}
custom_colors <- c(
  "IL" = "#35B7AD",  
  "ND" = "#1F28A2",  
  "IA" = "#9D9ED4", 
  "AL" = "#AE6C13",  
  "NY" = "#7D0112"
)

ggplot(data, aes(x = Oat_Heading_Date)) +
  geom_histogram(aes(y = ..density..), color = "black", fill = "gray", bins = 30, alpha = 0.5) +
  geom_density(aes(color = interaction(studyLoc)), size = 1) +
  scale_color_manual(values = custom_colors) +
  labs(
    #title = "Distribution with Density Lines by Year and Location",
    x = "Value",
    y = "Density",
    color = "Location"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()


ggplot(multi_location_data, aes(x = log(Oat_Heading_Date))) +
  geom_histogram(aes(y = ..density..), color = "black", fill = "gray", bins = 30, alpha = 0.5) +
  geom_density(aes(color = interaction(studyLoc)), size = 1) +
  scale_color_manual(values = custom_colors) +
  labs(
    #title = "Distribution with Density Lines by Year and Location",
    x = "Value",
    y = "Density",
    color = "Location"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()

rm(custom_colors)


```
